title: email
description: An email in SK must always be related to an object. Receivers are limited to 5 per address field.

bcc_addr.description: BCC addresses, comma separated. Max 5, format: a@b.de,'George'<georg@sk.eu>

cc_addr.description: CC addresses, comma separated. Max 5, format: a@b.de,'George'<georg@sk.eu>

to_addr.description: TO addresses, comma separated. Max 5, format: a@b.de,'George'<georg@sk.eu>

related_object_type.description: Object type of the emails parent. Is the camelcased base class name: Document for invoice, credit_note,.., Contact for client

related_object_id.description: uuid of the emails parent object.

in_progress.description: Is set after an email has been scheduled for sending until it has been sent.

delivered_at.description: Date the email was delivered by SK. If set, the message cannot be edited anymore.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

team_id.description: A team uuid. If set only the team and its parent teams can see the record.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 10, max is 100

filter[address].title: Search in address
filter[address].description: Searches in all address fields: bcc, cc, to, from

filter[from].title: From date
filter[from].description: All objects updated on/after the date

filter[to].title: To date
filter[to].description: All objects updated on/before the date

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC

template_id.title: Template
template_id.description: UUID of an email template to use. If present, subject, body and attachments of the template are used for the current email.

send.title: Send email
send.description: If present(any val) email is scheduled for sending.

archived_pdf.title: Attach archived pdf
archived_pdf.description: Adds the archived pdf from the related resource(if it has one).
